title.en: Mutsu Enmei Ryuu Gaiden - Shura no Toki

altTitles.en: Mutsu Enmei Ryū Gaiden - Shura no Toki
Mutsu Enmei Ryū Gaiden: Shura no Toki
Mutsu Enmei Ryuu Gaiden: Shura no Toki

description.en:
Even since the Heian era, the members of the Mutsu family have practiced an unarmed martial art, the Mutsu Enmei Ryū. They walked the path of the undefeated and were called the Shura no Mono (Men of Carnage). This is their story.
[hr][b]Arcs:[/b]
[*][b]1st:[/b] Yakumo Mutsu (Musashi Miyamoto era) [i]- Vol. 1[/i]
[*][b]2nd:[/b] Izumi Mutsu (Ryoma Sakamoto era) [i]- Vol. 2, 3[/i]
[*][b]3rd:[/b] Azuma Mutsu (Izumi's younger brother) [i]- Vol. 4[/i]
[*][b]4th:[/b] Takato Mutsu (Tokugawa era) [i]- Vol. 5, 6[/i]
[*][b]5th:[/b] Kiichi Mutsu (Yoshitsune Minamoto era) [i]- Vol. 7, 8, 9, 10 (elex edition)[/i]
[*][b]6th:[/b] Tatsumi Mutsu, Komahiko and Torahiko (Oda Nobunaga Arc) [i]- Vol. 11, 12, 13[/i]
[*][b]7th:[/b] Tenpei Mutsu (Shiro Saigon Arc) [i]- Vol. 14[/i]
[*][b]8th:[/b] Sakon Mutsu (Raiden Tameemon Arc) [i]- Vol. 15[/i]

note for anime arcs:

yakumo's story: ep 1-8

takato's story: ep 9-15

Izumi's story: ep 16-26
